definitions.definition: To attack quickly or suddenly , as by an air raid or similar action.

examples: The Washington High defense almost always blitzes on third down.

definitions.definition: To purée or chop (food products) using a food processor or blender .
examples: To make nut roast, you have to blitz the nuts in the food processor before adding the parsley and breadcrumbs.

definitions.definition: To do something quickly or in one session .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To attack quickly or suddenly , as by an air raid or similar action.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , American football ) To perform a blitz .
( transitive , cooking ) To purée or chop (food products) using a food processor or blender .
( transitive , informal ) To do something quickly or in one session .
